subject: A 40 second segment 23-session1
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_58c2_4b87_63ba
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I think linear sweep works just as well as the random mode i had been using 
all these years. Once again anohter theory bites the dust! I thought it had 
to be random, and that was the assumption I was working from the past five 
years. So all I can say for sure is that if we supply an audio source that 
the spirits/entities can make a voice out of, they will.  They use what we 
use, and I don't it matters alot what you use, there is no one system, or 
method,..... no right, or correct way.

I avve to ask, -----if no one is is listening do the spirits still speak?


Frank--late for work agian!!
